title: RansomEye UBA Behavior Delta
description: Frozen schema for behavior deltas. All fields are mandatory. Zero optional fields allowed. Delta is a fact, not a score.

delta_id.description: Unique identifier for this delta (UUID v4)

baseline_hash.description: SHA256 hash of baseline used for comparison

observation_window_start.description: RFC3339 UTC timestamp of observation window start

observation_window_end.description: RFC3339 UTC timestamp of observation window end

baseline_value.description: Value from baseline (string for categorical, number for frequency)

delta_magnitude.description: Numeric difference (count difference or presence delta, NOT a score)

first_seen_timestamp.description: RFC3339 UTC timestamp of first observation of this delta

last_seen_timestamp.description: RFC3339 UTC timestamp of last observation of this delta

immutable_hash.description: SHA256 hash of delta record (immutability guarantee)

ledger_entry_id.description: Audit ledger entry ID for this delta
